not_a_restourant.title: Not a Restaurant
not_a_restourant.capter_1: Chef Simone Finetti will bring to life an unforgettable experience with stories, tastings, and samplings of food and drinks specially selected for the occasion.
not_a_restourant.capter_2: You will discover gastronomy like you have never known it before.
not_a_restourant.capter_3: Learning about the origin of the foods themselves, their history, and the methods used to cook them

praise.title_1: If the Lord has commanded us to eat to live and invites us to nourish ourselves through appetite, by eating we are following a divine precept.
praise.title_2: Now, the question of choosing foods remains, and since it is absurd that God has put so many good things in the world solely for the wicked, let us eat them and thank Him who gave us the joy of being able to taste them.

chose_menu.title: Take a Look at Our Menus
chose_menu.sub_title: Book your seat and experience a tasting show at Villa Albertina.
